name: Gun Upgrade
description:
Every time you finish a level you are put in a new location with a new gun, and you must survive as many levels as you can. Every five levels you must face more enemies. It has a zombie mode, game pad support, a custom rules mode, and two-player local co-op.

Features:

  • Two Player Co-Op (Local) or Single Player
  • Custom Rules Mode
  • Zombie Mode
  • Gamepad Support
    • version for Windows is only fully compatible with Xbox 360 controllers
    • version for Android is compatible with most gamepads supported by your computer
  • Ten Locations
  • Ten Guns (including crossbows, rocket launchers, and mini guns)

System Requirements:

  • Windows XP and up
  • Android 2.3 and up

The Android version uses the Bluetooth permission.
